Properties.Name: Text
Properties.Value: This workflow retrieves user data from Ramp, formats and maps it, then creates contacts in HubSpot CRM. It logs the result as either success or error for each contact creation attempt.

Properties.Description: Unique identifier for the sample operation.
Properties.Name: OperationId

Properties.Description: A brief description or summary of the operation.
Properties.Name: Description
Response

Properties.Description: The number of results to be returned in each page. The value must be between 2 and 100. If not specified, the default value 20 will be used. (integer)
Properties.Name: page_size

Properties.Description: Create a contact with the given properties and return a copy of the object, including the ID. Documentation and examples for creating standard contacts is provided.
Properties.Name: Name

Name: Ramp To HubSpot Contacts
Description: This Workflow retrieves user data from Ramp, formats and maps it, then creates contacts in HubSpot CRM. It logs the result as either success or error for each contact creation attempt.
